title: Highlight Selected Word
description: Settings for the Highlight Selected Word extension.

highlightColor.title: Highlight Color
highlightColor.description: CSS color for the highlight background (e.g. '#d7d4f0', 'rgba(255, 255, 0, 0.3)').

outlineColor.title: Outline Color
outlineColor.description: CSS color for the highlight outline.

highlightColorBlurred.title: Blurred Highlight Color
highlightColorBlurred.description: CSS color for the highlight background in unfocused cells.

outlineWidth.title: Outline Width (px)
outlineWidth.description: Width of the outline in pixels.

codeCellsOnly.title: Code Cells Only
codeCellsOnly.description: Restrict highlighting to code cells only.

minChars.title: Minimum Characters
minChars.description: Minimum number of characters required to trigger highlighting.

wholeWords.title: Whole Words Only
wholeWords.description: Only highlight matches that are whole words.

highlightWordUnderCursor.title: Highlight Word Under Cursor
highlightWordUnderCursor.description: Automatically highlight the word under the cursor when there is no text selected.

delay.title: Debounce Delay (ms)
delay.description: Delay in milliseconds before highlighting triggers after selection changes.

enableOnLoad.title: Enable on Load
enableOnLoad.description: Enable highlighting by default when JupyterLab starts.
